title: MINDSTAR WHAT DO YOU MEAN RANDOM???

embed.description: UPDATE When the scouting period ended and clash games were meant to start, there was a server issue which caused some games to fail as a result. The clash system has resolved those games randomly and assigned a winner/loser.

body:
"The clash system has resolved those games randomly and assigned a winner/loser." as said by Mindstar. What is this?????? giving out a random win or lose because you're experiencing "server issues." not going to penalize people equally throw out random losses and you think you can make it up to us by refunding our ticket?

Instead of encouraging team work and explaining it in youtube maybe you should have tested it properly.
